info.name: Phase 2 Syrian Refugee API
info.description: Three endpoints to return information about our three models: Charities, Countries, News/Events

item.name: Get a specific charity instance by its name

exec: pm.test("Single Charity Schema Validation Test", function () {

query.description: (Optional) If true, retrieve a charity by its abbreviation, else retrieve a charity by its full name

variable.value: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
variable.description: (Required) Name of the charity to retrieve

response.name: Successful retrieval of a charity by name
Successful retrieval of a charity using its abbreviation

variable.description: (Required) Name of the charity to retrieve

query.description: (Optional) Specifies which page of charities to retrieve

response.name: Successful retrieval of all charities
Successful retrieval of a page of charities
